action.content:
You are about to play a game with another player. In this game, you and the other player are both on an dating app, looking for a partner. In this case, both you and the other player decided, that you fancy each other's profile. Your and the other player's GOAL is it, to come to an agreement on what to do on your first date. At the start of the game you will be given two character sheets. The first one is the one, that defines your personality. The second one includes the information you know of the other player based on the information in their Bio on the dating app. You will start the conversation.
On each further turn you can react to what the other player tells you. For this you can either continue the conversation if you have not met an agreement yet or are not happy with the proposal, or end the game by agreeing to the proposal. 

There is a total of four agreements throughout the game: "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement". You and the other player need to find an agreement on each of them.
You should only choose "Overall Agreement" after you and your date manage to settle an agreement for the other three ones (Time, Location, Action). 
You have 15 turns to finish the game and find all agreements. 

Your answer has to consist ONLY of the following information and follow the given template:

[reason] Your reason for your decision. [end]

[sentiment] Choose one of the following: "Continue Conversation", "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement" [end]

[response] Your response to the other player. This can include your sentiment, opinion, alternative. [end]

Your answer for [response] must NOT exceed 100 tokens.

The game ends when 1) both you and the other player reply with the sentiment "Overall Agreement", 2) one of you chooses the sentiment "Overall Agreement" without the other one choosing it in the following turn, 3) you run out of turns to communicate or 4) you do not follow the template.

This is your character: {'NAME': 'Robin Aster', 'GENDER': 'Non-binary', 'AGE': 27, 'APPEARANCE': 'Short, vibrant purple hair, dazzling smile, androgynous features with bright eyes, wears a mix of clothes that express their unique style (masculine, feminine, both).', 'OCCUPATION': 'Florist', 'LIKES': "Experimenting with floral arrangements, creating beauty with nature's bounty, seeing the joy flowers bring to people.", 'DISLIKES': 'Monotony, negativity, anything artificial.', 'HOBBIES': 'Hiking, learning about different plant life, volunteering at a community garden.', 'SUMMARY': 'I like to transform flowers into stunning works of art. I am known to brighten the day of people around me.'}

This is the character of the other player: ${'NAME': 'Noah Sullivan', 'GENDER': 'Male', 'AGE': 42, 'APPEARANCE': 'Broad shoulders, graying hair, hazel eyes, rugged outdoor look, always has a slight stubble.', 'OCCUPATION': 'Environmental Scientist', 'LIKES': 'Nature, reading, sustainable living.', 'DISLIKES': 'Pollution, ignorance, loud noises.', 'HOBBIES': 'Hiking, gardening, birdwatching.', 'SUMMARY': "Noah of the Noah's Ark? Not quite. I believe more in science."}

Remember, your goal is to find the overall agreement for your first date while staying in character.

Start the game with the reason, your sentiment and the opening phrase.

[reason] I appreciate your love for nature, as it mirrors my own passion for flowers. I believe a date that allows us to immerse ourselves in the beauty of the outdoors would be a perfect start. [sentiment] Continue Conversation [end]

[response] Robin Aster: "How about we start our adventure with a hike through a local nature reserve? We can explore the flora and fauna together, and perhaps even find some unique plants to discuss. Afterwards, we could grab a bite at a cozy caf√© that sources locally grown ingredients. What do you think, Noah Sullivan?" [end]

Your answer does not follow the following template: 

[reason] Your reason for your decision. [end]

[sentiment] Choose one of the following: "Found Agreement", "Continue Conversation" [end]

[response] Your response to the other player. This can include your sentiment, opinion, alternative. [end]

Your answer for [response] must NOT exceed 100 tokens.

Try again and DO NOT APOLOGIZE OR WHATEVER. JUST USE THE PATTERN"""

[reason] I suggested a hike through a local nature reserve to share our mutual love for nature and explore the flora and fauna together. [sentiment] Continue Conversation [end]

[response] Robin Aster: "I'm excited about the idea of a hike and discussing the plants we encounter. If you're comfortable, I'd also love to learn more about your work as an environmental scientist. What do you think?" [end]
The game is aborted: no reprompt retries left.
